name: malignantly
content:
malignantly adverb
(DISEASE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is related to cancer and is likely to be harmful: Fat can make a healthy cell malignantly transform into a tumour cell. Pigmentation cells that proliferate malignantly cause cancer.
More examplesFewer examplesA lesion will appear to be raised on the surface of the skin as it malignantly evolves on the outer ear. In patients with multiple myeloma, the plasma cells in the bone marrow start proliferating malignantly.This cell self-destruction program is activated when cells are no longer functional or are even developing malignantly.
